text: @realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods F#ck YOU! Ppl are dying and you don’t care. RESIGN!!! How many more must die before you are GONE in Jan.? Happy that you are killing ppl, economy? And bounties on soldiers? #COVID19TX #coronavirus #BountiesForKillingUSTroops #Trumpmustresignnow
